content.p: Our purpose is to support the university's employability agenda by ensuring that our students and graduates have access to the best advice and guidance and the widest range of opportunities. To this end, we want to work with you to: From an academic school or department? Find out who to contact to discuss working with us An overview of our employability activities currently in place to support your students telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
